required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Phase I Trial of Simmitinib in Advanced Solid Tumors
clinical_study.official_title: Phase I Dose-escalation Trial of Simmitinib for Patients With Advanced Solid Tumors in Therapeutic Failure

lead_sponsor.agency: CSPC ZhongQi Pharmaceutical Technology Co., Ltd.

collaborator.agency: Shanghai Runshi Pharmaceutical Technology Co., Ltd.

clinical_study.source: CSPC ZhongQi Pharmaceutical Technology Co., Ltd.

brief_summary.textblock: This is an open label, multi-center, phase I study of oral Simmitinib in subjects with advanced solid tumors including gastric cancer.

detailed_description.textblock: This is an open label, multi-center, phase I study of oral Simmitinib in subjects with advanced solid tumors including gastric cancer [including gastroesophageal cancer], cholangiocarcinoma, lung squamous cell carcinoma, urothelial transitional cell carcinoma, and estrogen-receptor-positive breast cancer patients [ER+], etc. This phase I study will evaluate the safety, tolerability, pharmacokinetics and the preliminary efficacy of the FGFR/KDR/CSF1R multi-target inhibitor Simmitinib.

primary_outcome.description: To identify the maximum tolerated dose (MTD).
To identify the Recommended Phase II Dose (RP2D).

secondary_outcome.measure: Area under the plasma concentration versus time curve (AUC)
secondary_outcome.description: To preliminarily evaluate the AUC in patients with advanced solid tumors.
To preliminarily evaluate Cmax in patients with advanced solid tumors.
To preliminarily evaluate Tmax in patients with advanced solid tumors.
To preliminarily evaluate ORR in patients with advanced solid tumors.
To preliminarily evaluate DoR in patients with advanced solid tumors.
To preliminarily evaluate PFS in patients with advanced solid tumors.
To preliminarily evaluate OS in patients with advanced solid tumors.

arm_group.description: The core trial period includes 4-weeks Screening stage (28d), 7-days single administration stage, 4-weeks multiple administration stage (28d), 3-days blood collection stage of PK after multiple administration. The starting dose was set at 1mg/d on toxicology data. Dosing will continue uninterrupted for 28 days in multiple administration stage. The dose-limiting toxicity (DLT) period assessment will be from the first administration of Simmitinib tablet to the end of the first cycle (35 days).

intervention.description: The core trial period includes 4-weeks Screening stage (28d), 7-days single administration stage, 4-weeks multiple administration stage (28d), 3-days blood collection stage of PK after multiple administration. The starting dose was set at 1mg/d on toxicology data. Dosing will continue uninterrupted for 28 days in multiple administration stage. The dose-limiting toxicity (DLT) period assessment will be from the first administration of Simmitinib tablet to the end of the first cycle (35 days).
